definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: I leave uncultivated today was precisely yesterday perishes tomorrow which person of the body implored.
sentences.chinese: 我曠廢的本日側是昨日殞身之人期求的暗日。

sentences.english: I oversleep again this morning and was almost late for work.
sentences.chinese: 本日早上又睡過甚了，上班差點遲到。

sentences.english: Assuming it rains this morning- what shall we do?
sentences.chinese: 假設本日下午下雨的話我們奈何辦？

sentences.english: Today is the last day to add or drop courses for this semester.
sentences.chinese: 本日爲這學期最後一天加退選。

sentences.english: I'll go with you to the cinema this mid-day if I'm free.
sentences.chinese: 若是本日下午我有空的話，就和你一齊去看電影。

sentences.english: The baby is out of sorts today. Perhaps he is cutting a tooth.
sentences.chinese: 阿誰嬰兒本日不太舒服，他大概正在長牙。

sentences.english: To-day is the festival of phantoms that know not when they die.
sentences.chinese: 本日是幻影的節日，他們不知道本身的死期。

sentences.english: My love of to dight finds no home in the nest deserted by yesterday's love.
sentences.chinese: 於昨日之愛拋棄的巢穴中，我的本日之愛無家可歸。

sentences.english: Idid three loads of wash today.
We have two Chinese classes this afternoon, let's practise writing a composition.
sentences.chinese: 本日下午有兩節語文課，我們操練一篇作文。

sentences.english: Even today, the Nobel Prize symbolizes the greatest achievements in science.
sentences.chinese: 知道本日，諾貝爾獎仍然象徵着最宏年夜的成績。

sentences.english: I think it's going to be anice day.
sentences.chinese: 我想本日會是一個好天。

sentences.english: It's 200 French francs at today's selling rate.
sentences.chinese: 本日的賣出價是200法功令國法王法郎。

sentences.english: Pleautomotive service engineers shut the door: It's very cold today.
sentences.chinese: 本日天氣真冷，請打開門，好嗎？

sentences.english: Take a day off. That's what I'm doing today. Don't tell my boss.
sentences.chinese: 放一天假這正是我本日干的，別見告我的老闆。

definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
this or that very day/in the next few days
(of a store, stock market etc) to open for trading/to make the first transaction of the day
